definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a stone, set up ([[שׂים]],[[החיב ]]), and anointed as memorial of divine appearance Ge 28:18, Ge 28:22, Ge 31:13 (all E), Ge 35:14 (J); so also Ge 33:20 (E), where ins. ´[[מ]], or rd. ´[[מ]] for MT [[מִזְבֵּחַ]] (We Di Now:Arch. ii.18), set up ([[שׂים]]), [[הרים]], [[חחיב]] in token of an agreement Ge 31:45, Ge 31:51, Ge 31:52, Ge 31:52 (all E); over grave Ge 35:20, Ge 35:20

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: esp. of sacred stones or pillars in connexion with altar, erected ([[בנה]] ) by Moses Ex 24:4 (E; 12 pillars), Ho 3:4, Ho 10:1, Ho 10:2, Is 19:19; conj. also 2Ki 12:10 for MT [[מִזְבֵּחַ]] Sta:ZAW v (1885), 296 Now:Arch. l.c., but dub., v. Benz:ad loc.; (usu.+ [[אֲשֵׁרִים]] etc.): of Canaanites Ex 23:24 (E), Ex 34:13 (J), De 7:5, De 12:3 cf. [[הַבַּלְַ]] ´[[מ]] 2Ki 3:2, 2Ki 10:26, 2Ki 10:27; Tyre, [[עֻזֵּח]] ´[[מ]], Ez Eze 26:11, of obelisks of Heliopolis in Egypt; condemned for Isr. by Deut. code, and Deut. redaction of K: De 16:22, 1Ki 14:23, 1Ki 17:10, 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 23:14, 2Ch 14:2, 2Ch 31:1; cf. Mic 5:12, Le 26:1 (H).—On maṣṣēbā v. further Now:Arch.ii.18 f. Benz:Arch. 380 f. Dr:De 16:21 f. We:Skizzen iii.99,165 RS:Sem.i.184 ff. 437.f; 2d ed. 204 ff. 456 f.; K. 50.—Ju Jdg 9:6 v. [[[נׇחַב]]]

definitions.title: Hoph. 2.
definitions.body: stock, stump of tree Is 6:13 a (in sim.), so v:Is 6:13 b (fig.; but prob. del. as gloss).
